content.description: Four forces of equal magnitude are exerted on a square at the locations and in the directions indicated in the figure. Points <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>A</mtext></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mtext>B</mtext></math> are labeled for reference.
content.question: Which of the following correctly compares the magnitudes of the torque, <math alttext="tau" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>τ</mi></math>, exerted by the forces about Point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, tau sub 3 equals tau sub 4, close parenthesis, is greater than tau sub 2, which is greater than tau sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub 1 is greater than open parenthesis, tau sub 3 equals tau sub 4, close parenthesis, which is greater than tau sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub 1 is greater than tau sub 3, which is greater than tau sub 2, which is greater than tau sub 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub 4 is greater than tau sub 2, which is greater than tau sub 3, which is greater than tau sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="tau sub 1 is greater than open parenthesis, tau sub 3 equals tau sub 4, close parenthesis, which is greater than tau sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
